Metadata.name: Signature Skills+ - Magatsu Mandala (Magatsu-Izanagi)
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
Allows Magatsu-Izanagi to learn the signature skill "Magatsu Mandala" at level 89.
Dark: deals heavy damage to all foes with a chance of Panic/Fear/Enervation.
Power: 160 Accuracy: 90 Effect chance: 50 Cost: 30 SP
